sentences.english: The superior geographical position is one which of substantial clauses Xuankong Temple can preserve complete.
sentences.chinese: 優越的地理位置是懸空寺能完好保存的重要原因之一。

sentences.english: In a moment, we're going to learn Chinese at Xuankong Temple on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一會兒我們就要去山上的懸空寺學漢語。

sentences.english: Bukak Monastery of Hengshan is rare in the world.
sentences.chinese: 北嶽恆山的懸空寺更是世間罕見。

sentences.english: Qingyin Pavilion is known as the second largest suspended temple on the Daciyan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 清音閣被稱作是大慈巖的第二懸空寺。

sentences.english: So people also customarily call it Xuangkong Si instead of Xuankong Guan.
sentences.chinese: 所以人們就習慣性地稱它爲懸空寺。

sentences.english: Viewer friends, the Xuangkong Temple is indeed very dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆朋友們，這懸空寺真是懸啊。

sentences.english: Baoxiang Temple Baoxiang Temple was constructed in the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 寶相寺被譽爲雲南“懸空寺”始建於元代。
